headline: Kroger (KR) Increases Despite Market Slip: Here's What You Need to Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Kroger (KR) stood at $70.72, denoting a +1.41% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: BUBS, VIRAL SWEDISH CANDY BRAND HAS LANDED STATESIDE
summary: BUBS, the iconic Swedish candy brand and social media sensation, today announced its long-awaited arrival in the U.S. Beginning in August 2025, consumers can find the brand's signature foamy and gummy candies at major retailers nationwide, including Target, Walmart, Kroger, Albertsons, CVS and Walgreens.

raw.headline: BUBS, VIRAL SWEDISH CANDY BRAND HAS LANDED STATESIDE

headline: Pop Secret速 Pops Into A New Snacking Era
summary: Pop Secret速, the nostalgic popcorn brand in the Our Home portfolio, is popping into even more snack aisles following the launch of its first-ever Ready-to-Eat popcorn line. Now available at approximately 2,300 doors nationwide, fans can grab the new ready-to-eat bags in all three flavors: Movie Theater Butter, Homestyle Sea Salt, and Double Cheddar. Delivering Pop Secret's iconic taste in a no-microwave-needed format, these on-the-go bags are perfect for spontaneous snack moments wherever they s

headline: 80 Acres Farms merges with vertical-farming peer Soli Organic
summary: Operating under the 80 Acres Farms name, the combined entity is expected to achieve first-year revenues of about $200m.
